properties.description: ingest population data from blob to datalake

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy data population data
ifTrueActivities.description: copy raw gz population data from blob storage to raw tsv data to datalake

sources.name: HospitaAdmissionsSource
sources.description: Transform Hospital admission with date and country lookup datasets

sources.name: DimDateSource
sources.description: Adding date data to the analysis

transformations.name: selectRequiredField
transformations.description: Removing url, rename date to date reported, renaming year_week to reported_year-week

transformations.name: removeunnecessarcolumns
transformations.description: remove columns that we do not need

transformations.name: SplitDailyFromWeekly
transformations.description: split only daily based on indicator

transformations.name: DeriveECDCYearWeek
transformations.description: derive new column that has year and week number

scriptLines: removeunnecessarcolumns split(indicator == 'Daily hospital occupancy' || indicator == 'Daily ICU occupancy',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
